item.description:
Join Chabad of Peabody as we Celebrate
a one of a kind....... Hip Hop Purim!
*Interactive megillah reading
*Delectable purim feast
*Hip hop/beat boxing/break dancing/ by internation reigning hip hop champs from phunk phenomon
*Music and dancing
*Awesome energy and light design by the prop factory
*Open Bar for the adults and radiance for the kids!
*Amazing puppet show for the kids
*Entertainment and fun for the whole family!
*Come dressed in a costume and be entered into a IPOD raffle

For EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT RSVP a MUST BY FEB. 20th. To RSVP go to this link www.jewishpeabody.com/hiphop

REMEMBER, IN ORDER TO PREPARE PROPERLY, YOUR FACEBOOK RESERVATION IS NOT YOUR DISCOUNTED RESERVATION. YOU MUST DO IT ONLINE AT THE LINK ABOVE.

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Purim party
